title: Derive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Meredith's sole axiom

blocks.name: meredith
blocks.content: Carew Meredith's sole axiom for propositional calculus. This amazing formula is thought to be the shortest possible single axiom for propositional calculus with inference rule ~ ax-mp , where negation and implication are primitive. Here we prove Meredith's axiom from ~ ax-1 , ~ ax-2 , and ~ ax-3 . Then from it we derive the Lukasiewicz axioms ~ luk-1 , ~ luk-2 , and ~ luk-3 . Using these we finally rederive our axioms as ~ ax1 , ~ ax2 , and ~ ax3 , thus proving the equivalence of all three systems. C. A. Meredith, "Single Axioms for the Systems (C,N), (C,O) and (A,N) of the Two-Valued Propositional Calculus", _The Journal of Computing Systems_ vol. 1 (1953), pp. 155-164. Meredith claimed to be close to a proof that this axiom is the shortest possible, but the proof was apparently never completed. An obscure Irish lecturer, Meredith (1904-1976) became enamored with logic somewhat late in life after attending talks by Lukasiewicz and produced many remarkable results such as this axiom. From his obituary: "He did logic whenever time and opportunity presented themselves, and he did it on whatever materials came to hand: in a pub, his favored pint of porter within reach, he would use the inside of cigarette packs to write proofs for logical colleagues." (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2002.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 28-May-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm meredith(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w2), wn(w3))), w2), w4), wi(wi(w4, w0), wi(w3, w0)))
} = {
  ja(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w2), wn(w3))), w2), w4, wi(wi(w4, w0), wi(w3, w0)))
  a1d(wn(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w2), wn(w3))), w2)), wi(w4, w0), wi(w3, w0))
  com12(wn(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w2), wn(w3))), w2)), w3, w0)
  con1d(w3, wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w2), wn(w3))), w2), w0)
  com13(w3, wn(w0), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w2), wn(w3))), w2)
  imim12i(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w2), wn(w3)), wn(w0), wi(w3, w2))
  pm2.21(w0, w1)
  con4(w2, w3)
  imim1d(w4, w4, w0, w3)
  ax-1(w4, w3)
}

blocks.origin:
thm merlem13(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))), w1))
} = {
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))), w1)), wi(wi(wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))), w0), w0))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))), w0), w0), wi(wi(wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))), w0), wi(wi(wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))), w0), w0)))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))), w0), wi(wi(wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))), w0), w0)), wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wi(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))))
  merlem12(w2, w3, wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))), wi(wi(wi(wi(wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))), w1), wi(wn(wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wn(wn(w0)))), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))), w1), wi(wn(wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wn(wn(w0)))), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))), wi(wn(wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wn(wn(w0))))
  ax-mp(wi(wn(wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wn(wn(w0))), wi(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))), wn(wn(w0))))
  merlem12(w2, w3, wn(wn(w0)))
  merlem5(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))), wn(wn(w0)))
  merlem6(wi(wn(wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wn(wn(w0))), wi(wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))), w1), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))), wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)))
  meredith(wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))), w1, wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))), wn(w0), wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))))
  merlem6(wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))))), wi(w1, w1), w0, wi(wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))), w0))
  merlem11(wi(wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(wn(w0), wn(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0)))))), w0), w0)
  meredith(w1, w1, w0, wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(wn(w3)), w3)), wn(wn(w0))), w0)
}
